info.report-description: LTE Cell Resource measurement (M8011) measures cell resource related measurements

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: MIN_AVAIL_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C0)
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the minimum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_AVAIL_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C1)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the maximum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MEAN_AVAIL_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C2)
kpi_info.use: The mean number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (e.g. 5.4 is stored as 54). Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the mean value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MIN_AVAIL_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C3)
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the minimum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_AVAIL_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C4)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the maximum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MEAN_AVAIL_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C5)
kpi_info.use: The mean number of available Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (e.g. 5.4 is stored as 54). Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the mean value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MIN_ALLOC_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C6)
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the minimum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_ALLOC_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C7)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the maximum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MEAN_ALLOC_UL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C8)
kpi_info.use: The mean number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in uplink per TTI per UE. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (e.g. 5.4 is stored as 54). Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the mean value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MIN_ALLOC_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C9)
kpi_info.use: The minimum number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the minimum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MAX_ALLOC_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C10)
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the maximum value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: MEAN_ALLOC_DL_PRB_TTI_UE (M8011C11)
kpi_info.use: The mean number of allocated Physical Resource Block (PRB) in downlink per TTI per UE. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (e.g. 5.4 is stored as 54). Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated with the mean value for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_1 (M8011C12)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of <= 10% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_2 (M8011C13)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 10% < PRBUTIL < = 20% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_3 (M8011C14)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 20% < PRBUTIL < = 30% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_4 (M8011C15)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 30% < PRBUTIL < = 40% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_5 (M8011C16)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 40% < PRBUTIL < = 50% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_6 (M8011C17)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 50% < PRBUTIL < = 60% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_7 (M8011C18)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 60% < PRBUTIL < = 70% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_8 (M8011C19)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 70% < PRBUTIL < = 80% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_9 (M8011C20)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 80% < PRBUTIL < = 90% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_10 (M8011C21)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 90% < PRBUTIL < = 100% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MIN (M8011C22)
kpi_info.use: The minimum value of the UL Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MAX (M8011C23)
kpi_info.use: The maximum value of the UL Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MEAN (M8011C24)
kpi_info.use: The mean value of the UL Physical Resource Block (PRB) use per TTI. The use is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (for example 5.4 is stored as 54). UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_1 (M8011C25)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of <= 10% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_2 (M8011C26)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 10% < PRBUTIL < = 20% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_3 (M8011C27)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 20% < PRBUTIL < = 30% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_4 (M8011C28)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilisation is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 30% < PRBUTIL < = 40% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_5 (M8011C29)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 40% < PRBUTIL < = 50% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_6 (M8011C30)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 50% < PRBUTIL < = 60% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_7 (M8011C31)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 60% < PRBUTIL < = 70% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_8 (M8011C32)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 70% < PRBUTIL < = 80% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_9 (M8011C33)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 80% < PRBUTIL < = 90% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_LEVEL_10 (M8011C34)
kpi_info.use: The Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. Utilization in the range of 90% < PRBUTIL < = 100% is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated per TTI.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MIN (M8011C35)
kpi_info.use: The minimum value of the DL Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. UPDATED: Updated when the minimum value of an allocated DL PRB is detected.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MAX (M8011C36)
kpi_info.use: The maximum value of the DL Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. UPDATED: Updated when the maximum value of an allocated DL PRB is detected.

kpi_info.title: DL_PRB_UTIL_TTI_MEAN (M8011C37)
kpi_info.use: The mean value of the DL Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI. The utilization is defined by the rate of used PRB per TTI. The reported value is 10 times higher than the actual value (for example 5.4 is stored as 54). UPDATED: Updated with the average rate value of an allocated DL PRB over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: CCE_AVAIL_ACT_TTI (M8011C38)
kpi_info.use: Total number of CCEs available for active TTIs when at least one PDCCH is going to be scheduled. UPDATED: In PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: AGG1_USED_PDCCH (M8011C39)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG1 used for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group1 is used for PDCCH scheduling.

kpi_info.title: AGG2_USED_PDCCH (M8011C40)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG2 used for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group2 is used for PDCCH scheduling.

kpi_info.title: AGG4_USED_PDCCH (M8011C41)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG4 used for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group4 is used for PDCCH scheduling.

kpi_info.title: AGG8_USED_PDCCH (M8011C42)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG8 used for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group8 is used for PDCCH scheduling.

kpi_info.title: AGG1_BLOCKED_PDCCH (M8011C43)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG1 blocked for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group1 is blocked for PDCCH scheduling. A DCI with required AGG1, which cannot be scheduled at all or cannot be scheduled with required power for finally allocated AGG, is considered as blocked.

kpi_info.title: AGG2_BLOCKED_PDCCH (M8011C44)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG2 blocked for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group2 is blocked for PDCCH scheduling. A DCI with required AGG2, which cannot be scheduled at all or cannot be scheduled with required power for finally allocated AGG, is considered as blocked.

kpi_info.title: AGG4_BLOCKED_PDCCH (M8011C45)
kpi_info.use: Total number of AGG4 blocked for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: When Aggregation Group4 is blocked for PDCCH scheduling. A DCI with required AGG4, which cannot be scheduled at all or cannot be scheduled with required power for finally allocated AGG, is considered as blocked.

kpi_info.title: AGG8_BLOCKED_PDCCH (M8011C46)
kpi_info.use: The total number of AGG8 blocked for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period. UPDATED: This counter is updated when Aggregation Group8 is blocked for PDCCH scheduling. A DCI with required AGG8, which cannot be scheduled at all or cannot be scheduled with required power for finally allocated AGG, is considered as blocked.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_UL_TOTAL (M8011C47)
kpi_info.use: Total number of PRBs used for UL transmissions on PUSCH, PUCCH and PRACH over the measurement period is updated to this counter. A PRB covers the pair of resource blocks of two consecutive slots in a subframe. UPDATED: This counter is updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PRACH (M8011C48)
kpi_info.use: Total number of used PRB's for PRACH scheduling over the measurement period is updated to this counter. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PUCCH (M8011C49)
kpi_info.use: Total number of PRBs used for PUCCH over the measurement period is updated to this counter. A PRB covers the pair of resource blocks of two consecutive slots in a subframe. UPDATED: This counter is updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PUSCH (M8011C50)
kpi_info.use: Total number of PRBs used for UL transmissions on PUSCH over the measurement period is updated to this counter. A PRB covers the pair of resource blocks of two consecutive slots in a subframe. UPDATED: This counter is updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_DL_TOTAL (M8011C51)
kpi_info.use: Total number of PRBs used for DL transmissions over the measurement period is updated to this counter. A PRB covers the pair of resource blocks of two consecutive slots in a subframe. UPDATED: This counter is updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PBCH (M8011C52)
kpi_info.use: Total number of used PRB's for PBCH scheduling over the measurement period is updated to this counter. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PDCCH (M8011C53)
kpi_info.use: Total number of used PRB's for PDCCH scheduling over the measurement period is updated to this counter. Pairs of resource blocks over two slots in a subframe is updated to this counter. UPDATED: Updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: PRB_USED_PDSCH (M8011C54)
kpi_info.use: Total number of PRBs used for PDSCH over the measurement period is updated to this counter. A PRB covers the pair of resource blocks of two consecutive slots in a subframe. UPDATED: This counter is updated in each scheduling for the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: UE_PER_UL_TTI_AVG (M8011C55)
kpi_info.use: Average value of UEs served per TTI on uplink during a measurement period. Counter unit is 0.1 UE. For example, counter value 100 represents ten UEs. UPDATED: The mean value over the measurement period is updated to this counter. The mean value is the arithmetical average of all TTI measured in a granularity period.

kpi_info.title: UE_PER_UL_TTI_MAX (M8011C56)
kpi_info.use: Maximum value of UEs served per TTI on uplink during a measurement period. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the maximum value of the served UEs in UL per TTI has been reached.

kpi_info.title: UE_PER_DL_TTI_AVG (M8011C57)
kpi_info.use: Average value of UEs served per TTI on downlink during a measurement period. Counter unit is 0.1 UE. For example, counter value 100 represents ten UEs. UPDATED: The mean value over the measurement period is updated to this counter. The mean value is the arithmetical average of all TTI measured in a granularity period. Note: The number of TTIs to calculate the mean value includes all DL and special subframes (TDD only). It also includes TTIs in which no PDSCH can be scheduled, for example, the special subframes in the configuration of normal CP and special subframe configuration 5 (TDD only), the subframes with PRS, MBMS subframes, ABS subframes, and so on.

kpi_info.title: UE_PER_DL_TTI_MAX (M8011C58)
kpi_info.use: Maximum value of UEs served per TTI on downlink during a measurement period. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the maximum value of the served UEs in DL per TTI has been reached.

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_1_OFDM_SYMBOL (M8011C59)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of subframes when only 1 OFDM symbol is allocated to the PDCCH (3GPP TS 36.211, 36.300). UPDATED: This counter is updated with every subframe for which only 1 OFDM symbol is allocated to the PDCCH. This counter is not updated for subframes for which the number of allocated PDCCH OFDM symbols is different from 1 (for example 2).

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_2_OFDM_SYMBOLS (M8011C60)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of subframes when 2 OFDM symbols are allocated to the PDCCH (3GPP TS 36.211, 36.300). UPDATED: This counter is updated with every subframe for which 2 OFDM symbols are allocated to the PDCCH. This counter is not updated for subframes for which the number of allocated PDCCH OFDM symbols is different from 2 (for example 3).

kpi_info.title: PDCCH_3_OFDM_SYMBOLS (M8011C61)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of subframes when 3 OFDM symbols are allocated to the PDCCH (3GPP TS 36.211, 36.300). UPDATED: This counter is updated with every subframe for which 3 OFDM symbols are allocated to the PDCCH. This counter is not updated for subframes for which the number of allocated PDCCH OFDM symbols is different from 3 (for example 2).

kpi_info.title: TTI_BUNDLING_MODE_UE_AVG (M8011C62)
kpi_info.use: The measurement provides the number of UEs configured to TTI Bundling mode. If the same UE is sent to TTI Bundling mode more than once during the measurement period it is counted manifold. UPDATED: This counter is updated after each sampling interval with the arithmetical average of samples each representing the number of UEs in TTI Bundling mode at that moment.

kpi_info.title: TTI_BUNDLING_GRANTS (M8011C63)
kpi_info.use: Total number of grants for TTI Bundling. UPDATED: The counter is incremented each time a UE is entitled a grant to send a "TTI Bundle".

kpi_info.title: TTI_BUNDL_RETENTION_SHORT (M8011C64)
kpi_info.use: The measurement represents the number of UEs that are in TTI Bundling mode for only a short period of time, which is defined as less than t1 seconds, i.e. retention time in TTI Bundling mode < t1 sec. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the UE is switched back from TTI Bundling mode earlier than t1 seconds after switching to TTI Bundling. Termination by leaving the cell (HO) is also counted.

kpi_info.title: TTI_BUNDL_RETENTION_MEDIUM (M8011C65)
kpi_info.use: The measurement represents the number of UEs that are in TTI Bundling mode for a medium period of time. This time period is defined by a lower bound of t1 seconds and an upper bound of t2 seconds, i.e. retention time in TTI Bundling mode: t1 = x = t2 sec. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the UE is switched back from TTI Bundling mode within this time span. Termination by leaving the cell (HO) is also counted.

kpi_info.title: TTI_BUNDL_RETENTION_LONG (M8011C66)
kpi_info.use: The measurement represents the number of UEs that are in TTI Bundling mode for a long period of time, which is defined as longer than t2 seconds, i.e. retention time in TTI Bundling mode > t2 sec. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the UE is switched back from TTI Bundling later than t2 seconds after switching to TTI Bundling mode. Termination by leaving the cell (HO) is also counted.

kpi_info.title: CA_SCELL_CONFIG_ATT (M8011C67)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of SCell configuration attempts. UPDATED: Transmission of an RRC:RRCConnectionReconfiguration message, which includes a "SCellToAddModList-r10" parameter.

kpi_info.title: CA_SCELL_CONFIG_SUCC (M8011C68)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of successful SCell configuration attempts. UPDATED: Reception of an RRC:RRCConnectionReconfigurationComplete message related to a preceding RRC:RRCConnectionReconfiguration message, which included a "SCellToAddModList-r10" parameter and addressed to the same UE.

kpi_info.title: HIGH_CELL_LOAD_LB (M8011C69)
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates the occurrence that the cell is in the active Load Balancing state.When the cell is in the active Load Balancing state, the Load Balancing algorithm tries to reduce the serving cell load by shifting cell traffic to neighbor cells (Load Balancing handover).The maximum value of this counter depends on the length of the measurement period. If the measurement period is 15 minutes (that is 900 sec), the maximum value of this counter is 900 sec/1 sec = 900 (every 1 second the eNB checks whether the cell is in the active Load Balancing state). UPDATED: Every 1 second the eNB checks whether the cell is in the active Load Balancing state; the counter is updated if the result of this check is that the cell is in the active Load Balancing state (that is the Load Balancing algorithm tries to shift cell load to neighbor cells).

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_UL_GRP_1 (M8011C70)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 1 is scheduled in UL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a UL TTI is assigned to CRG 1.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_UL_GRP_2 (M8011C71)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 2 is scheduled in UL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a UL TTI is assigned to CRG 2.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_UL_GRP_3 (M8011C72)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 3 is scheduled in UL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a UL TTI is assigned to CRG 3.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_UL_GRP_4 (M8011C73)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 4 is scheduled in UL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a UL TTI is assigned to CRG 4.

kpi_info.title: TTI_PUSCH_AVAILABLE (M8011C74)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which PUSCH could be scheduled. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a TTI could potentially be used for PUSCH data. (In case no data is present, there is no need to actually use this TTI for data transfer.)

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_DL_GRP_1 (M8011C75)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 1 is scheduled in DL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a DL TTI is assigned to CRG 1.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_DL_GRP_2 (M8011C76)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 2 is scheduled in DL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a DL TTI is assigned to CRG 2.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_DL_GRP_3 (M8011C77)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 3 is scheduled in DL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a DL TTI is assigned to CRG 3.

kpi_info.title: CRG_USED_TTI_DL_GRP_4 (M8011C78)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which cell resource group 4 is scheduled in DL. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a DL TTI is assigned to CRG 4.

kpi_info.title: TTI_PDSCH_AVAILABLE (M8011C79)
kpi_info.use: The number of TTIs in which PDSCH could be scheduled. UPDATED: The counter is updated whenever a TTI could potentially be used for PDSCH data. (In case no data is present, there is no need to actually use this TTI for data transfer.)

kpi_info.title: UL_MU_MIMO_SHA_PUSCH_PRB_AVG (M8011C80)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average use ratio of PUSCH PRBs per TTI, which are shared in UL MU-MIMO mode by a pair of UEs, that means, in each TTI the number of shared PUSCH PRBs is divided by the total number of available PUSCH PRBs in this TTI. UPDATED: The counter is updated per each TTI by the average use ratio of PUSCH PRBs, which are shared by a pair of UEs (in UL MU-MIMO mode).

kpi_info.title: DL_CAC_EQUAL_ZERO (M8011C81)
kpi_info.use: This counter is a part of the histogram "Cell DL Composite Available Capacity (DL CAC)" and provides the number of events when the measured downlink CAC of the cell was zero (DL CAC = 0). Load balancing is activated to shift traffic from the high-loaded LTE serving cell to the lower-loaded LTE neighbor cell by favoring handovers from the serving cell to the neighbor cell (by applying neighbor-cell-related handover thresholds which favor handovers to the neighbor cell). The DL CAC of the cell is measured by the eNB internally and is used by the eNB in the context of cell load measurements for load balancing between cells (3GPP TS 36.423). A DL CAC value "0" indicates no available capacity, and value "100" indicates maximum available capacity in the cell (see 3GPP TS 36.423).

kpi_info.title: E_ICIC_DL_PRB_UTIL_LEVEL_0 (M8011C118)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of ABS sub-frames without user plane traffic of CRE UEs. The PRB utilization is defined as the ratio of used PRB per ABS sub-frame compared to the total number of PRBs for dynamic scheduling of user plane traffic in the same TTI. Note: "CRE UEs" are UEs located in the range expansion area of the small cell. UPDATED: This counter is incremented per ABS sub-frame if there is no user plane traffic, that is, the PRB utilization of the CRE UE is 0 %.

kpi_info.title: E_ICIC_DL_PRB_UTIL_LEVEL_1 (M8011C119)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of ABS sub-frames of CRE UEs with a PRB utilization range of 0 % < x <= 10 %. The PRB utilization is defined as the ratio of used PRB per ABS sub-frame compared to the total number of PRBs for dynamic scheduling of user plane traffic in the same TTI.Note: "CRE UEs" are UEs located in the range expansion area of the small cell. UPDATED: This counter is incremented per ABS sub-frame if the PRB utilization of the CRE UE is in the range 0 % < x <= 10 %.

Note: "CRE UEs" are UEs located in the range expansion area of the small cell. UPDATED: This counter is incremented per ABS sub-frame if the PRB utilization of the CRE UE is in the range 40 % < x <= 50 %.

kpi_info.title: UL_PRB_USAGE_SAEB_QOS_1 (M8011C140)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the percentage usage of uplink Physical Resource Blocks (PRB) (partially/fully) for DTCH traffic for SAEB QoS level 1. The maximum counter value 1000 represents 100% and the minimum counter value 1 represents 0.1%. UPDATED: This measurement is determined by accumulating the number of uplink PRBs (i.e. the sum of complete PRBs and fractions of PRBs) used for DTCH traffic for SAEB QoS level 1 and the number of available uplink PRBs for DTCH traffic every sample period. At the end of the collection interval the accumulated used PRBs is divided by the accumulated available PRBs to obtain the measurement percentage value.

kpi_info.title: E_ICIC_MUTING_PATTERN_0 (M8011C164)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the accumulated time of muting pattern 0 activation in the macro cell of an eICIC scenario. "Muting pattern 0" means a muting pattern with no muted TTIs. UPDATED: This counter is updated every 500 ms when the muting pattern 0 is active, i.e. when no muting is applied.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
